name: @mayajs/common
description: A Node.js framework for REST API server-side-applications.

scripts.start: npm run clean && wait-on -r index.js && npm run tsc
scripts.clean: rimraf index.js && rimraf index.d.ts && rimraf lib && rimraf core && rimraf interfaces && rimraf typings && rimraf validator && rimraf *.tgz
scripts.prepack: npm run clean && wait-on -r index.js && tsc

author: Mark Anthony C. Ignacio
